Seongmin Hong

I am currently a PhD candidate at the Intelligent Computational imaging Lab (Prof. Se Young Chun) in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at Seoul National University. I graduated from the same department in 2020 and decided to continue my research journey in pursuit of a doctoral degree.

Email: smhongok@snu.ac.kr
